fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.util.gl

Class BasicTexture

  • Object
    • BasicTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLTexture
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryGradientTexture, ImageColormap, RasterImage

    public class BasicTexture
extends Object
implements GLTexture
    Author:
    JeT Basic texture returns the coordinates equal to the provided point. It manages a texture by its filename and is a good base class for inheritance
